channel.title: Json on {code that works}
channel.description: Recent content in Json on {code that works}

item.title: Making sense of Cloud Foundry security group declarations
item.description: Cloud Foundry allows fine grained declaration of security groups, down to IP address ranges and Ports. While this provides great flexibility, making sense of why each rule in a security group exists and what each does is really difficult because of the limitations of the security group declaration mechanism.

item.title: Validating JSON in Emacs
item.description: At work, I have to deal with Amazon CloudFormation 1 templates a fair bit. These templates are JSON files. More and more members of our team are moving away from TextMate to Emacs which makes me really happy. We would like to validate these CloudFormation templates in Emacs. Today we set this up and I hope this turns out to be of help to some one else trying to do the same.
